sections.name: App Story
sections.content: A local Library Manager that stores books, members, and loan records as JSON files on the user's computer. It supports creating, listing, updating, and deleting books and members, and creating and returning loans. The app enforces business rules: prevent borrowing when a book has no available copies and prevent a member from borrowing when they have reached their loan limit. All data persists locally in JSON and the app runs fully offline.

sections.name: Entry Point
sections.content:
Run with: python library_manager.py

The program reads and writes JSON files in the working directory and prints concise operation summaries to stdout. No stdin input or interactive prompts.
